effect.x_y: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 20% chance to raise the user’s Attack one stage.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 20% chance to raise the user’s Attack one stage.

short_effect.x_y: Has a 20% chance to raise the user’s Attack by one stage.
short_effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Has a 20% chance to raise the user’s Attack by one stage.

flavor_text.x_y: The target is hit with a hard punch fired like a meteor. This may also raise the user’s Attack stat.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: The target is hit with a hard punch fired like a meteor. This may also raise the user’s Attack stat.
